import pprint

from lib.base import Base
from xmlconfiguration import XmlConfiguration



[docs]class FormatConfiguration(XmlConfiguration, dict):
    """
    Read the format configuration file.
    """

    def __init__(self, file_name=''):
        """
        instantiation
        """
        if file_name != '':
            configuration_file_name = file_name
        super(FormatConfiguration, self).__init__()

    '''
    Make sure and enter the appropriate entry in the logging configuration
    file
    '''
    @property

[docs]    def logger_name(self):
        return 'configuration'


    @property

[docs]    def configuration_file_name(self):
        return __name__



[docs]    def process_configuration(self, parent):
        config = {}
        for item in parent.findall('item'):
            format = item.text
            device = item.get('device')
            port = item.get('port')
            if (device not in config):
                ports = {}
            else:
                ports = config[device]
            ports[port] = format
            config[device] = ports
        return config
